question: Aqueous solution of raw sugar when passed over beds of animal charcoal, it becomes colourless. Pick the correct set of terminologies:
choices: Adsorbent: Animal Charcoal, Adsorbate: Colouring Substance
Adsorbent: Colouring Substance, Adsorbate: Animal Charcoal
explanation: Animal charcoal acts as the Adsorbent (surface), and the colouring substance acts as the Adsorbate (sticks to surface).
